name: Escape The Fire
description:
In this game you play as an adventurer, in a cold forest as wildfire started spreading! your goal is to escape the fire, but don't go too far, or else you'll die from cold in this endless forest

on your escape you'll find a lot of obstacles which will slow you down, and bring the fire closer, however there is also ice, which moves the fire away, pick as much ice as you can but not too much, because if you get too far from the fire, you will die from cold.

beware, as there is also a lot of lakes in the area, which are very cold, I wouldn't suggest jumping into one as that will kill you.

Keys:

AD for right and left

SPACE for jumping

ESC or M to open the menu

Can you survive?

TEAM:

Amit Nave (Amiter)
